# NitroLogbook+autolinking.cmake
# This file was generated by nitrogen. DO NOT MODIFY THIS FILE.
# https://github.com/mrousavy/nitro

#

# This is a CMake file that adds all files generated by Nitrogen
# to the current CMake project.
#
# To use it, add this to your CMakeLists.txt:
# ```cmake
# include(${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/../nitrogen/generated/android/NitroLogbook+autolinking.cmake)
# ```

# Define a flag to check if we are building properly and enable RN Raw Props parsing
target_compile_definitions(
  ${CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE
  BUILDING_NITROLOGBOOK_WITH_GENERATED_CMAKE_PROJECT
)

# Enable Raw Props parsing in react-native (for Nitro Views)
add_definitions(-DRN_SERIALIZABLE_STATE)

target_include_directories(${CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC 
  shared/c++
  android/
  ./
)

# Add all .cpp sources that were generated by Nitrogen
target_sources(
  # CMake project name (Android C++ library name)
  ${CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE
  # Autolinking Setup
  android/NitroLogbookOnLoad.cpp
  # Shared Nitrogen C++ sources
  shared/c++/HybridLogbookSpec.cpp
  # Android-specific Nitrogen C++ sources
)

# Add all .cpp sources that were generated by Nitrogen
target_sources(${CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE 
  android/NitroLogbookOnLoad.cpp
  shared/c++/HybridLogbookSpec.cpp
)

# From node_modules/react-native/ReactAndroid/cmake-utils/folly-flags.cmake
# Used in node_modules/react-native/ReactAndroid/cmake-utils/ReactNative-application.cmake
target_compile_definitions(
  ${CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE
  -DFOLLY_NO_CONFIG=1
  -DFOLLY_HAVE_CLOCK_GETTIME=1
  -DFOLLY_USE_LIBCPP=1
  -DFOLLY_CFG_NO_COROUTINES=1
  -DFOLLY_MOBILE=1
  -DFOLLY_HAVE_RECVMMSG=1
  -DFOLLY_HAVE_PTHREAD=1
  # Once we target android-23 above, we can comment
  # the following line. NDK uses GNU style stderror_r() after API 23.
  -DFOLLY_HAVE_XSI_STRERROR_R=1
)

# Add all libraries required by the generated specs
find_package(fbjni REQUIRED) # <-- Used for communication between Java <-> C++
find_package(ReactAndroid REQUIRED) # <-- Used to set up React Native bindings (e.g. CallInvoker/TurboModule)
find_package(react-native-nitro-modules REQUIRED) # <-- Used to create all HybridObjects and use the Nitro core library

# target_link_libraries(${CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME} logbook log)

# Link all libraries together (RN >= 0.76)
target_link_libraries(
  ${CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME}
  fbjni::fbjni                              # <-- Facebook C++ JNI helpers
  ReactAndroid::jsi                         # <-- RN: JSI
  ReactAndroid::reactnative                 # <-- RN: Native Modules umbrella prefab
  react-native-nitro-modules::NitroModules  # <-- NitroModules Core :)
)

# i had to modify this file, sorry :(
# but it’s almost identical to the original :)
